name: Trio Pac Inc.
tag_list: table-top-conveyor, plastic-belt, stainless-steel-conveyor, packaging-conveyor, accumulation-conveyor, convoyeur-agroalimentaire, fabricant-de-convoyeur, convoyeur-montral
overview: Since 1992, our company has positioned itself to meet customer demand for inventive and affordable solutions to their business needs. A sought-after partner and industry leader, our success can be attributed in part to providing all employees with ongoing training and professional development programs. Always at the leading edge of the latest trends in the business, we are committed to creating innovative and productive strategies to achieve the ultimate objective; employ state-of-the-art technology to provide customers with top-quality products and impeccable service.
